text:
After adding additional group access rights to a subtree "intern" in the live
area, i find two directories in config/ac/policies/live:

intern (contains the correct settings).
intern.html (contains obsolete settings).

if this is by design, it should be documented, since unexplainable behaviour in
security-related components tends to make me nervous.
creator: nettings@apache.org
nettings@apache.org
text:
i haven't seen this for a while. probably got fixed, or was due to my custom
publication being out-of-sync with the trunk.
